msg.value: Invalid token or no new reward

doc_string.value:
@notice Initiate ownership tansfer of the contract
    @param _owner Address to have ownership transferred to

natspec.author: Mobius.Fi

params._distributor: Address permitted to call `notify_reward_amount` for this token
params._duration: Number of seconds that rewards of this token are streamed over

commit_transfer_ownership(address).notice: Initiate ownership tansfer of the contract

params._owner: Address to have ownership transferred to

notify_reward_amount(address).details: Only callable by the distributor if there is an active reward period. The reward tokens must be transferred into the contract prior to calling this function. Rewards are distributed over `reward_duration` seconds. Updating the reward amount while an existing reward period is still active causes the remaining rewards to be evenly distributed over the new period.
notify_reward_amount(address).notice: Notify the contract of a newly received reward

remove_reward(address).details: Any remaining balance of the reward token is transferred to the owner

set_receiver(address).details: When the receiver is a smart contract, it must be capable of recognizing rewards that are directly pushed to it (without a call to `get_reward`)

set_reward_duration(address,uint256).details: Only callable when there is not an active reward period
set_reward_duration(address,uint256).notice: Modify the duration that rewards are distributed over

params._duration: Number of seconds to distribute rewards over

natspec.notice: Evenly streams one or more reward tokens to a single recipient
natspec.title: Child-Chain Streamer
